info.name: DoomNextcloud
info.summary: A 100% open Doom-like game in your Nextcloud, powered by WebAssembly and Freedoom.
info.description:
DoomNextcloud runs a fully playable, 100% open Doom-like game directly inside your Nextcloud web UI. No proprietary downloads, no external CDNs. The game engine runs as a WebAssembly module and the default IWAD is Freedoom â€” all assets served locally.
**MVP Features:** - Launch from the Nextcloud navigation bar. - Renders a playable level on an HTML5 canvas. - Keyboard and mouse input. - Audio support in modern browsers. - Zero external network requests at runtime.
**Requirements:** - Freedoom WAD placed by the server administrator (see documentation). - Modern browser: Chrome, Firefox, or Safari (latest 2 major versions).
